item.title: Light It Red: Exploring Bell Tower Celebrations with R
item.description: NC State Belltower Among the sights to see when taking a trip to Raleigh is NC Stateâ€™s iconic Belltower. Erected as a monument to honor fallen soldiers of WW1, the memorial Belltower has become a symbol of pride for NC State students and alumni. On any given night, the bell tower might have a red illumination. Red bell tower lightings signify special achievements made by NC State organizations and staff as well as memorial holidays.
